messages: 35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:20): why cant i play local audio files with audio tag?
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (15:20): same reason you can't do anythign else locally in chrome
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (15:21): although audio doesn't have same-origin restriction in general, so could be something else
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (15:22): try to lift the file: same-origin restriction with some command-line flag
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:22): hmm how can i do that?
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (15:22): don't remember, google for it
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:24): cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0: oh and also, is it possible to get a file's path when selected from input type file?
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:25): damn.. i guess that would be because of some security problem :(
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:27): ok last tid bid..  am trying to play a local audio file through html5 audio tag.. user either drags the mp3 file or selects from input type file..
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:27): can you give any idea as to how do i cange user's input to audio's source?
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (15:28): oh i thought you were doing <audio src="file:...">
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:29): i was doing that only but it dosent work..
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:29): it was a proof of concept
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:29): that audio can play audio files but as it turns out chrome dosent
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:30): one way is to use dataurls but they become very very long and cannot be stored in websql :((((((
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (15:30): input.onchange = function(e) { var file = input.files[0]; var url = URL.createObjectURL(file); audio.src = url }
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:31): ohkeexxx let me check that out.. :D :D
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:35): what is 'URL.'? where does URL come from?
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (15:36): it's defined in abarth's url spec iirc
cc097e0d7183ae8436e7df709553c8c0 (15:46): use revokeObjectURL() when you don't need the url anymore
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:47): but can i store this url to websql for later use?
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:49): actualy i wanted to make playlists
35b5f6d890ec51c3ea289a9c467f689f (15:49): but hey this far is far enough.. this is awsone.. thanks alot for you help :D
